name: Avian Days
description:
In an eerie dystopia, you play a man on a strange mission, with an even stranger skill set. Develop your bird-taming skills in this focused Metroidvania, where you can use birds to disable enemies, soak up their bullets, serve as platforms over spikes, and most importantly, as means of transportation.

Will you manage to reach the button and rewind time? Will you be able to save yourself and return to what you were before?

/ / / / / C O N T R O L S / / / / /

1) Arrows to move/jump.

2) X to throw bread.

3) C to whistle (once you have unlocked it).

4) C+DOWN to summon birds from below (once you have unlocked it).

/ / / / / N O T E / / / / /

This game was developed in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 32. This version includes some visual enhancements, bug fixes, and some tweaks. I may revisit it later on to add more puzzles and/or abilities, and to make the boss more interesting.
